name: Feel the Heat (djwc95)
description: Feel The Heat is a game about a group of astronauts on faraway planet. These scientists have been studying an icy world  that has been safe for years. Without warning, a snowstorm ravages for days and temperatures fall to dangerously low levels. To keep the city warm, the player must scour the terrain for trees which can be cut down and burned to keep your friends alive. Race the clock in this survival adventure game where you will definitely Feel The Heat!
